Title: Establishes a Black Leadership Institute within the state university of New York
Summary: Establishes a Black Leadership Institute within the state university of New York as an initiative for Black leaders in higher education with a mission to retain and grow from within SUNY a greater proportion of Black professionals at SUNY campuses; creates an eight member advisory council.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a Black Leadership Institute within the State University of New York
